item.title: My honest opinion about Unit Testing
item.description: This is my honest opinion about Unit Testing in Software Engineering Imagine now you are in the kitchen. You are going to make an omelet. Then, you must prepare the tools first, a stove, a pan, fried spoon, a knife etc. Then, you also must have the needs, such as eggs, pepper, salt etc. Then, letâ€™s make a new one. When making this new one, you must follow these steps without missing for a single thing.
